summary: A snobbish producer makes a documentary about the extraordinary behavior of her neighbor who believes himself to be Superman.
cast: Jung-min Hwang|Jun Ji-Hyun|Gil-seung Bang|Woo-hyuk Choi|Su-ji Jeon|Ji-hee Jin|Hie-bong Jo|Ae-sim Kang|Gi-seok Kim|Jae-rok Kim|Hyun-young Park|Yong-soo Park|Young-hwa Seo|Woo-seon Seon
title: Syoo-peo-maen-i-sseo-deon sa-na-i
